narrative.narrative: Based at Hong Kong International Airport, Hong Kong Airlines operates service to 23 mainline destinations that don't include charter and cargo service. Thier fleet of 23 planes includes 5 A320's,12 A330's and 5 A330 Freighters for cargo. They fly to many Asian countries and also have a flight to London. It's logo is a bauhinia flower, a Hong Kong native flower. It is 45% owned by Hainan Airlines.
